attributes.action: Stop the mayor of London from destroying our history and statues
attributes.additional_details: It isn’t his right to make these decisions , he doesn’t seem to have our tourist industry or the nations best interests at heart and should not be allowed to make these decisions without the public’s permission .
attributes.background: Ensure that the London mayor cannot change our history and legacy by removing historical monuments or changing names of places without the permission of parliament .

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The actions of the Mayor of London aren't the responsibility of Government or Parliament. 

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/325814
